thread.title: Lady Gaga Just Got a Huge Pre-Grammys Back Tattoo
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Just Got a Huge Pre-Grammys Back Tattoo

title: Lady Gaga Just Got a Huge Pre-Grammys Back Tattoo
text: Lady Gaga Just Got a Huge Pre-Grammys Back Tattoo See her new ink. Share via Twitter Courtesy of Instagram/@ladygaga When it comes to her pre-show routine, Lady Gaga is no stranger to sharing behind-the-scenes intel with fans on social media. Prior to her stunning Super Bowl Halftime Show performance last Sunday, Gaga posted tons of sneak peeks at how she was prepping to take the stage in the weeks leading up to the show, as well as on the day of . And today, as Gaga prepares to perform at the 2017 Grammy Awards with Metallica, she's posted another social media teaser—this one showing off a new tattoo. Lady Gaga took to Instagram just hours before the show began to share her brand new (and kind of huge) tattoo. The singer's ink—which seems to pretty much cover her entire back—is a moth, wings spread wide, with the head of a skull. We're guessing that she got the tattoo in honor of her upcoming performance with the legendary heavy metal band, considering she captioned the photo, "The Moth & Metallica ... #ink #tattoo #MothIntoFlame #MetalliGa #metal #grammys @metallica." It's not totally clear whether this ink is actually real (though it certainly looks authentic). And if it is, we don't know exactly when she got that tattoo. But hey, getting some body art—permanent or not—is definitely a sure-fire way to get hype for a major performance with some storied, hard-core accompaniment. See Lady Gaga's tattoo Instagram below: Loading
